game.name: Safety Check YOSHI!
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This is a game where you earn points by identifying hazards (near-miss incidents). If you successfully point them out, say, "Safety check, YOSHI!"
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a game where you earn points by identifying hazards (near-miss incidents). If you successfully point them out, say, "Safety check, YOSHI!"
